name: i-Secure
overview:
Are you a person that handles a great deal of private information and always require to have it at hand? Now you donâ€™t need to have your information dispersed in several places, now you have the possibility to have it always with you at the palm of your hand.

With I-Secure, your problems are solved together with a required security level in order to protect your information from others.

What will you be able to do with I-Secure

-The ability to administer your information in multiplied organized categories -The capability to configure it the way you choose to see it -You will be able to create your favorite information that will allow you to access directly information that is used most frequently

I-Secure is the best tool to administer private information designed especially for your IPhone or IPod touch
